title: Glottography dataset derived from Haynie and Gavin 2019 "Modern language range mapping for the study of language diversity"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping language ranges for North American languages immediately prior to European colonial incursion, suitable for the study of language diversity patterns, derived from the map published with Haynie & Gavin 2019.
citation: Haynie, Hannah J. & Michael C. Gavin. 2019. Modern language range mapping for the study of language diversity. doi: 10.31235/osf.io/9fu7g.
